title: PBL-CBT Integrated Instructional Design for Ultrasound Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented educational environment utilizing ultrasound equipment and personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can apply ultrasound examination protocols with 80% accuracy by analyzing real clinical cases
Learners identify 70% or more key lesions by comparing ultrasound images of normal/abnormal findings
Learners can generate a differential diagnosis list of three or more conditions based on ultrasound findings during team-based problem-solving
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
